articles.title: Happy Birthday Mylswamy Annadurai: All you need to know about the Moon Man of India - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Mylswamy Annadurai, the ‘Moon Man of India’, turns 64 on July 2. Annadurai served as the director for India’s lunar probes, Chandrayaan-1 and Chandrayaan-2, earning him the title of the ‘Moon Man of India’.
